doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Nazmul Hasan Chowdhury
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Nazmul Hasan Chowdhury is a Neurologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Neurology). He is a Professor & Head, Neurology Department at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Gomati Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Nazmul Hasan Chowdhury at Gomati Hospital, Comilla is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
